Class TotalEncountersReport

  • java.lang.Object

      • report.TotalEncountersReport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionListener, UpdateListener

    public class TotalEncountersReport
extends Report
implements ConnectionListener, UpdateListener
    A report of the distribution of how many encounters (contacts) a node has had
